title: IDK who made this elise splash
body:
But god damn can they draw. That's probably one of the best splashes to come out of Riot for awhile. Everything about it is incredible. I think the fact that she isn't really doing any crazy action pose and the fact it captures Elise perfectly is what makes it so good. Whoever made that needs to keep making splash arts.

(Old post got deleted for being in the wrong place so I remade it in Story & Art)

replies.body: "didn't matter had sex" - Elise victim no. 247

lol i saw that on reddit.

also
"Elise is a black widow type that eats males once they get their sperm"
"Wear protection problem solved"
Probably my favorite splash in a while. Does the Queen much justice. {{champion:60}}

> Probably my favorite splash in a while. Does the Queen much justice. {{champion:60}}

too bad it's still a red skin.  anything more red than the original counts as red.

It's my favorite ever!!! So is the skin. I'm so glad about the final decision. Plz tell me it's the final version and you won't change her again? Also, one thing about the splash art is bugging me tho. Are those fangs of the big spider in the splash art gold or blue? I'm asking cuz they are blue in the game but look gold in the splash art. Just curious.  {{champion:60}}
blue the gold is a reflection from the lantern
So true. Will this go live? I hope so.
At first I thought it was too dark, but when I noticed the screaming faces I'm glad it's as dark as it is. It wouldn't have had the same impact it did when I first saw those faces.
I like how she's sitting on a throne of cocoons with screaming people in them.

Riot keeps teasing me with the Elsie skins. First Victorious, now this.

Because nothing is hotter than people trapped in spider web and screaming in sheer terror.

hhhhhhhhnnng, yes
A LOT of recent skin splash arts are amazing! Keep up the good work Riot! I mean, has anyone seen Eternum Rek'Sai and Blood Moon Thresh?!
Spooky, cool, and interesting. Give this artist a cookie! I like it!
This is my favorite splash art of all time. Wonderful and unique.
Wonder if there's a larger version so I can use it as a background...

will this work?

https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-VxT5o7LLeb4/VIFdsYJ7RGI/AAAAAAAAe7Q/Gmlw6TChJAs/s1600/Elise_Splash_3.jpg
Nah, it's not 1080p :(
Amazing splash art, best one for a while now, while I like all the new ones the whole super action pose stuff gets annoying after a while, this is just magnificent!
I agreed but well I tought no one would like it because i like the new ahri skin and no one really seem to apreciate it.
I can't remember where i saw it now >.< but i believe it was confirmed [Alex flores](http://alexflores.deviantart.com/gallery/?catpath=/) created it.

> I can't remember where i saw it now >.< but i believe it was confirmed [Alex flores](http://alexflores.deviantart.com/gallery/?catpath=/) created it.

I liked his Gnar lol..
http://media.giphy.com/media/P6NGyxkKCrtlK/giphy.gif
see now that's blood moon done right even in game it looks good I felt with the other blood moon like thresh they were trying to milk it because it was blood moon glad her skin came out lookin good
Best booby drawing details I have ever seen in my lyfe.
Woah thats epic,and the faces in the web,sweet xD

I totally agree that this splash is absolutely awesome. 

10/10

Not a huge fan of the hair on the splash (Weird seeing as it's my favourite part of the skin)
But everything else is perfect.

I haven't liked a splash since Heartseeker Ashe. 

+1 Rito

Thats not a default elise splash, Notice the hair is white, and she has red clothing, instead of black spider carapace armor..

BLOOD MOON ELISE CONFIRMED?!?!?!?

> Thats not a default elise splash, Notice the hair is white, and she has red clothing, instead of black spider carapace armor..
> 
> BLOOD MOON ELISE CONFIRMED?!?!?!?

....it's been on the PBE for 2 weeks now....
...so yes
You're very late, lmao
It's Blood Moon Elise's splash art. The skin is currently on the PBE for a while.
absolute amazing splash art, even though i "own" victorious elise, i will instantly buy this skin as soon as riot decides to make elise useful again.
LOOKS SEXY~~!!!!
Is she sitting on top of those poor screaming people? Cruel.
That's Elise for you ;D
dat sideboob. :P
Easily one of the best splashes in the game. I'm jealous of Elise players. They get great skins.
Is this going to replace the current Elise splash?
Nah, it's BM Elise's splash art
This really is an incredible piece of art that accurately represents m'Queen :). The way she's just lounging, completely in control over those screaming cocooned bodies below her.
compare to things like dat sivir splash art and annie splash art i am satisifed

For some reason, her hair is shaped in a really weird way.

But again, she isn't really human. That quality doe...
Pretty sure i saw helmet bro in there somewhere...

I really like it but... the face doesn't look anything like Elise.
Still, it's for a skin so yeah I love it.
Best{{champion:60}}  evur
It looks beautiful to say the least (would fap)
It reflects the nature of spiders, I loved it <3
